title: Can you stop the music?
abstract: The impact of inner-city gentrification on live music in Melbourne.
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.This documentary asks local councils, residential associations and live music venue operators to give their views on the impact that inner-city gentrification has had on the live music scene in Melbourne.  The once strong scene has seen a decline in the number of venues due to the increasing demand for inner city living.
